title: 7 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) 

Act 2022 (Parts 6 and 7) (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (parts 6 7) (commencement) order 2022

title: 7 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022) shall
heading: 2. The 27th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which Parts 6 and
text_raw:
2. The 27th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which Parts 6 and 
7 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 July, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd August, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [390] 3

title: 7 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022) shall
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the commencement on the 27th of July 2022 of Parts 6 
and 7 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2002 (No. 19 of 2022). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [390]
